descriptions.maid-manifest-architect.md: Phase 1: Creates and validates manifests from goals
descriptions.maid-plan-reviewer.md: Phase 2 Quality Gate: Reviews manifest and tests before implementation
descriptions.maid-test-designer.md: Phase 2: Creates behavioral tests from manifests
descriptions.maid-developer.md: Phase 3: Implements code to pass tests (TDD)
descriptions.maid-fixer.md: Phase 3 Support: Fixes validation errors and test failures
descriptions.maid-refactorer.md: Phase 3.5: Improves code quality while maintaining compliance
descriptions.maid-auditor.md: Cross-cutting: Enforces MAID compliance across all phases

descriptions.spike.md: Explore and spike an idea before creating manifest
descriptions.maid-run.md: Run complete MAID workflow from goal to validated implementation
descriptions.enhance-manifest.md: Enhance existing manifest with additional details
descriptions.validate-manifest.md: Validate and review manifest (Phase 1/2 quality gate)
descriptions.fix.md: Fix validation errors and test failures (Phase 3 support)
descriptions.run-validation.md: Run validation tests for a manifest or task number
